1. Make sure you have redshop component (v1.1.11) installed in j1.5 site and its database in not hacked
2. Do things in Readme.txt of redMIGRATOR component
3. Copy folder {your_j1.5_site_root}/components/com_redshop/assets
    to folder {your_j2.5_site_root}/components/com_redshop/
4. Install new version of redshop component (v1.3.3.1) in new j2.5.x
5. Install and enable redmigrator 3rd redshop plugin (plg_redmigrator_redshop)
